details.title: Terahertz Pioneer: Mattheus (Thijs) de Graauw “Intention, Attention, Execution”
details.abstract: Presents an interview with Mattheus (Thijs) de Graauw, a pioneer in terahertz science.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
